game.name: Princess Mermaid Skin Doctor
game.description:
This poor mermaid princess is struggling with some kind of unexpected skin problems which caused some ugly looking rashes on her face. She has already visited many healthcare facilities, but could get the effective treatment from nowhere else. Now the princess has come to your clinic with a hope. Would you be able to take care of her face perfectly? Join Princess Mermaid Skin Doctor and be prepared to give this pretty girl an amazing facial transformation by providing her the best beauty treatment!

She seriously has a very bad allergy on her face and come to you to get the instant medical help. Look into all the professional doctor tools and get ready to treat each break out, rash and wound finely in this HTML5 doctor game. Practice your best doctoring abilities to make her skin look flawless like never before! Start with electricity and then remove all the unwanted hair with the help of a pair of scissors! Use the laser to cure some of her other skin related issues! Remove her dead skin using a glass cutter and then rejuvenate her skin with a face mask with white mud!

Look into her skin closely with the help of a magnifying glass in this girl makeover game! Kill all the bacteria that cause acne using a special cream and then close off the pores with the help of an ice cube! Make sure to pop off all her ugly looking pimples and then help her to get rid of the other unnecessary bumps on her face using a golden face mask. Do not forget to brush her hair to complete the final step to make her skin look flawless.
